mapper.select: select empno, ename, job, to_char(hiredate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') hiredate, sal, d.dname, e.deptno from emp e, dept d where e.deptno = d.deptno order by e.ename, e.hiredate
mapper.insert: insert into emp (empno, ename, job, hiredate, sal, deptno) values (#{empno}, #{ename}, #{job}, #{hiredate}, #{sal}, #{deptno})
